data.md:MetaData: Pollen profile MAKSIMKI, Maksimkin Yar, Russia
Near village Maksimkin Yar. Section of raised bog in valley of Ket. Physiography: first terrase of Ket' River. Surrounding vegetation: Pinus sylvestris, Pinus sibirica, Betula, Picea.

Istorija rastitel'nosti yugo-vostoka Zapadnoi Sibiri v golotsene po dannym botanicheskogo i sporovo-pyl'tsevogo analiza torfa (The Holocene history of vegetation of south-eastern West Siberia by botanical and pollen analyses of peat deposits)
